attributes.action: subtitles for all the films at the cinema in UK.
attributes.additional_details:
I'm proudfully deaf since birth...
I would like to see the GOVERNMENT to take actions to ensure the cinema provide more subtitles and more choice for hard of hearing/deafness peoples in UK...
I would like to see every films that appear in the cinema will have SUBTITLES on every films.
as subtitles on 1 film at least once a week is not good enough at all...
I want to see the cinema in UK prepare to provide more and better service for deaf people by provide more subtitles on the films..
